message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its potential value, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I propose a starting price of $1,400,000.  This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your desire for a competitive price.  However, my initial offer reflects the true worth of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway - let's say $1,300,000, and we have a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable compromise.
